txt.en: 'Well met again, [placeholder]. We have some troubling news from the Cape. A group of territorial huorns has been expanding there, destroying property and lives alike, both peasants and nobles on the road to Umbar. Please, take the fight to them and trim their branches back.'
You have successfully defeated the huorn threat! Return to the mission giver with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Address the huorn problem on the Cape by paring their number back.
'Thank you for addressing the threat. It warms my heart to know that our citizens can move along the Cape without fear. Thank you for your valiant deeds.'
'Your objective is clear, [placeholder], pare back the huorn menace on the Cape. Too many innocents have already lost their lives from their pillaging attacks.'
Your mission is to address the huorn problem on the Cape by paring their number back.\n\nSpeak to Deshra to travel.
